Detailed Description

A class that manages several regions of interest (ROIs).

bool rois::get_closest ( cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &  req,
cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &  res 
)

Return the closest ROI.

Parameters
reqThe coordinates of the point to check.
resFor the closest ROI, the coordinates of the closest area boundary line segment, the coordinates of the closest point on the boundary, and the distance.
Returns
Whether request succeeded.
